value:
I'm a Manakete, so I can hear Naga's
voice. But...I haven't heard it at all
since coming to Askr...

Both my parents died when I was
young, so I was sent to live with the
family of one of their soldier friends.$k$pI didn't have anyone to talk to about
how lonely I was...

Working so hard all the time must
leave you feeling pretty hungry, huh?
Well, go bite down on a tree root.$k$pIf you can gnaw on it with the teeth in
the back, you won't feel as hungry!
Pretty good tip, right?

I'm still inexperienced in the ways of
Manakete. Sometimes I have trouble
fighting the urge to go wild...$k$pSo if I lose control, I want you to take
me out to a forest where I can't hurt
anyone. All right?

Oh, hi! I was just polishing my
dragonstone. It's important to be
ready for anything, right?$k$pYou should polish up that divine
weapon of yours, too!

Aren't you $Nu?
I've come with a greeting for
you from $Nf!$k$pAlways value your friends, all right?

Wow... I feel like I could
ravage an entire army!
I'm so happy I can grow stronger!

I'm sorry. I'll do better
next time, I promise.

Thanks for making me stronger.
I'll help you the best I can!

My name's Nah. It is an odd name,
but it's the one my mother gave me.$k$pEither way, I'll chew our enemies up
and spit them back out! Oh, I should
mention: I'm a Manakete.

Hiya! Do you need my help with
something? Whatever it is, just
leave it to me!$k$pHuh? You just want to...spend time
with me? But that doesn't sound
helpful... I'd really rather be helpful.$k$pYou'd let me stay here if I didn't help?
Really? Even if I was weak? Even if I
asked for things?!$k$p$Nu, that's...
That's so kind of you...$k$pI was raised by a foster family so I
was always trying to prove my worth.
But I guess I don't need to here...$k$pThank you for this. I'll stay by your
side for ever and ever,
$Nu!$k$pEven when I'm an old lady!
てりゃあ！
です！
ふぎゅっ！
しまったです…！
Okay, now I'm mad!
I am so strong!
I'm gonna let loose!
You know, I could eat you!
I only wanted...
えへへ
Do you think my name is weird? It's probably a little weird.
My breath attacks are amazing!
Summoners are so cool! Well, you're the first one I've ever met, but... Cool.
Hey, thanks for taking the time to say hi!
Don't worry about me. I know how to put up with a lot.
All I wanted was to see my mother and father again...
Leave the fighting to me. I can change into a dragon, you know! I'll bring peace to this world.
Ready!
Go, go, go!
I've got this.
